gold.user: Admin user requesting role mappings for a specific group.
gold.ideal: Returns the role mappings for the specified group and client.

gold.user: Admin user adding role mappings for a group.
gold.ideal: Successfully adds the specified role mappings to the group.

gold.user: Admin user removing role mappings from a group.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the specified role mappings from the group.

gold.user: Admin user checking available role mappings for a group.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of available role mappings for the specified group and client.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving composite role mappings for a group.
gold.ideal: Returns composite role mappings for the specified group and client.

gold.user: Admin user requesting role mappings for a specific user.
gold.ideal: Returns the role mappings for the specified user and client.

gold.user: Admin user adding role mappings for a user.
gold.ideal: Successfully adds the specified role mappings to the user.

gold.user: Admin user removing role mappings from a user.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the specified role mappings from the user.

gold.user: Admin user checking available role mappings for a user.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of available role mappings for the specified user and client.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving composite role mappings for a user.
gold.ideal: Returns composite role mappings for the specified user and client.
